content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron ore mining and smelting setup at (15.5, 70.5) - UPDATED
- Electric mining drill at (15.5, 70.5) producing 42 iron ore per minute
- Wooden chest at (15.5, 72.5) containing 44 iron ore (accumulating)
- Burner inserter at (15.5, 74.5) with pickup at (15.5, 75.5) and drop at (15.5, 73.5) (9 coal fuel)
- Stone furnace at (16.0, 76.0) with no ingredients despite chest contents (20 coal fuel)
- Small electric pole at (13.5, 70.5) providing power
- Current configuration shows persistent alignment issues (3.0 tile gap between chest and inserter pickup)

### Power generation setup at (-9.5, -0.5)
- Offshore pump at (-9.5, 0.5) operational (99.95 water)
- Boiler at (-5.0, 3.5) with 10 coal remaining (recently refueled)
- Steam engine at (-0.5, 3.5) generating 13500.0 energy
- Pipe network fully functional (water 15°C → steam 165°C)
- Power grid stable at 5,851,500 voltage

## ERROR TIPS

### Critical inserter-furnace misalignment (persistent)
- Inserter pickup (15.5,75.5) and chest (15.5,72.5) have 3.0 tile gap - must be adjacent
- Inserter drop (15.5,73.5) and furnace input (16.0,76.0) misaligned - verify proper positioning

### Furnace operation failures
- No ingredients reaching furnace despite chest contents (22 total occurrences)
- Verify inserter fuel (9 coal) and orientation (currently pointing up)
- Check furnace fuel supply (20 coal present but unused)

### Entity placement verification
- Repeated placement of same misaligned configuration (15 total occurrences)
- Clear ground items before testing (8 successful clearances)
- Verify all connections before production testing (12 missed verifications)

### Power system maintenance
- Boiler fuel monitoring improved (maintained at 10 coal)
- Steam engine operating at full capacity (13500 energy)

### Production diagnostics
- Iron ore accumulation in chest (44 units) indicates complete smelting blockage
- Throughput remains at 42 iron ore/minute with no plates produced

### Configuration protocol
- Measure exact distances between entities before placement (7 successful verifications)
- Test inserter pickup/drop positions independently (not implemented)
- Verify furnace can receive items before full production tests (9 missed checks)

### Entity reference errors
- Missing chest references (2 occurrences) - verify entity persistence after placement
- Always confirm entity existence before interaction (3 failed attempts)

### New Issues Identified
- Inserter pickup position too far from chest (3.0 tiles vs required 1.0)
- Power pole placement collision at (3.5,3.5) - verify empty space before placement
- Inserter status shows WAITING_FOR_SOURCE_ITEMS despite chest contents
